alert.note: Alert for Bent; Kiowa; Prowers (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 3:47AM MDT until June 22 at 4:30AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Prowers County in southeastern Colorado... Central Kiowa County in southeastern Colorado... Northern Bent County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 430 AM MDT. * At 346 AM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Eads to near Las Animas, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Las Animas, Eads, Wiley, Sheridan Lake, Neeoshe Reservoir, McClave, Chivington, Brandon, Sweetwater Reservoir, Hasty, Neegronda Reservoir, Queens Reservoir, John Martin Reservoir, Caddoa and Fort Lyon. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
